boardgame.name: Azul
アズール
花磚物語
아줄
boardgame.description: Introduced by the Moors, azulejos (originally white and blue ceramic tiles) were fully embraced by the Portuguese when their king Manuel I, on a visit to the Alhambra palace in Southern Spain, was mesmerized by the stunning beauty of the Moorish decorative tiles. The king, awestruck by the interior beauty of the Alhambra, immediately ordered that his own palace in Portugal be decorated with similar wall tiles. As a tile-laying artist, you have been challenged to embellish the walls of the Royal Palace of Evora._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the game Azul, players take turns drafting colored tiles from suppliers to their player board. Later in the round, players score points based on how they've placed their tiles to decorate the palace. Extra points are scored for specific patterns and completing sets; wasted supplies harm the player's score. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Game: Azul (Plan B/Pegasus) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: German, material language independent This is for a pre-order of Azul. Will arrive in November! Thanks in advance for ordering! See below for information on shipping, payment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; cancellation. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact frank@spieleberatung.com and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 frank@spieleberatung.com

This game is like new, from an adult collector and smoke free home. It has had two games of play. Additional pictures are available upon request. Only PayPal is accepted (unless local pick up is arranged, then cash is acceptable.) Shipping will be to US addresses only. I will combine shipping if multiple games are purchased. Typically I ship via USPS priority mail, but will ship FedEx for larger bundles for cost savings. Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Shipping for this item alone is $13.60 via USPS flat rate priority mail. Additional insurance can be purchased/included if requested. Local pick up in Thurston County WA is available upon request. Please GM with any questions. Thanks for looking.
